评论详情: This is a comfortable romper, I think it looks pretty and I’m happy with my purchase!
One thing I can say is that this jumpsuit did not disappoint. I will be ordering this and other colors.

This arrived within 24 hours. I saw it had excellent reviews from others. True to size, very comfortable, can be dressed up or down & ex accessorized. Great value with large choice of colors & variety of sizes available.

评论概述: Ordered this for my mother-in-law, but just wasn't for her
评论详情: As the headline says, I ordered this for my MIL, but she wasn't pleased. The jumpsuit itself was very roomy and stretchy as advertised, however, the material was a bit scratchy and thin. It fit her well on her thighs and legs, but it clings to the upper part of your body. She's overweight and doesn't like that the material accentuates her insecurities. The listing says it's loose and wide-legged, which it is, but doesn't mention the kind of material it's made from. If she would've known, she wouldn't have purchased it. Unfortunately, it's going back.
Fits great, but I had to have it hemmed because it was to long.

I bought this outfit for student teaching with low expectations. Most jumpers give me a front wedge because I have a longer torso than legs but not this one! The fabric is light weight and breathable. I got so many compliments when I wore it. I did listen to the other reviews and downsized due to the stretchy fabric
This is an effortless jumpsuit ! Great material and fit.  I ordered the wrong size so had to return , that’s my own fault.  True to size 10/12 preferred xl need a large.

Loved the style, fabric and color. Unfortunately, it was slightly too large so I needed to return. Amazon was quick to credit my account so I am getting ready to reorder in a smaller size and may order 2! It is so cute and comfortable but with plenty of style.
Fabric was flimsy and cheap looking. Also, it was too large. Returned and didn’t receive full refund. ☹️

Wore for my baby shower at 5’3 and 8 months pregnant, I ordered a large and it worked great! Very flattering and super comfy, a little long but honestly I just trimmed the bottoms! Wore platform converse with it!

I’m 5’3 and 160 lbs with sensitive skin and this fit surprisingly well! The fabric is comfy, it’s not too thin or too thick, not itchy, easy to wash, and yeah my pooch shows a little bit but otherwise I felt very confident in it! Got so many compliments the first day I wore it and a wonderful client purchased it for herself right in front of me!
Love it but is about a yard too long!
Way bigger than expected. I ordered a large, as i am normally, but should have done a medium in this.
I bought it but am to late to return it. Thin and wrinkles.

Fit is super awkward, particularly around the crotch area. I am not super tall and do not have a long torso by any means but it rode up really terribly and made my 🐱 look akin to a ken dolls undercarriage. Will be returning.

评论概述: Comfy and great quality, size down!
评论详情: Fabric was better than I expected! I normally wear a medium but the small fit perfect - wore with heels (I'm 5'5) and the length was perfect.
Everywhere I went everyone kept asking me where I got it from . I stood out lol. Very comfortable . I love this jump suit .
Cute romper but not talk girl friendly
I wore this for a wedding and I loved it so much. So flowy, soft, comfortable and stylish!
The material is light and flowy, but not see through. Length of medium is perfect for 5’9”. I love it!
I love this color! It fits perfectly! I’m 5”5 and got an XS
Beautiful jumpsuit. I'm 5'5 and I had to have it hemmed, but otherwise perfect fit.

评论概述: Came used with the tag on
评论详情: I had to return it because it came with stains. One sleeve had blood on it, and the other looked like a grease stain. It was pretty and I’m sure would of fit me perfect, but I can’t wear something I paid $30 for that has someone’s bodily fluids on it. That’s so gross
Runs big, got an XL which i know for a fact thats the perfect size for me should’ve gotten a L instead. It’s also very long so for my short girls you’ll have to get it shortened.
Wore as a host to a baby shower, so cute and comfortable for a very long day!
I got this jumpsuit in black and I love it! It has an elevated look, very comfortable, and flattering.  The pant length is not excessive and can even be pulled up a little at the waist.
I love this outfit, I’m 5’2” and 110 lbs and the xs fits me really well. I ended up ordering another color I liked it so much. Good quality for the price as well. I’d highly recommend this outfit👍
I'm 5 foot and this suit is fantastic. I'd buy again
Color, style and fit were all perfect. I will be buying other colors. 🌺

This jumpsuit is perfect for all occasions. It’s stretchy, flowy, breathable, and so comfortable. I wish I could have one in every color! I got my normal size, and probably could’ve comfortably sized down as well. The material doesn’t shrink much if at all when washed and dried and does not wrinkle easy either.
Love the jumpsuit and very easy to get on and off.
I wear a small. The outfit was too long in sleeves and the legs drug and tripped on them. I should've ordered an XS.
Super cute! I am 4’ 10” had to hem the size Medium but it turned out great dressed up!

I am 5’7” and 170lbs and curvy body and long torso. It fit perfectly. I didn’t want it too tight so I ordered the XL. I probably could have got a Large but I wanted a looser fit. I think because of the loose fit it wasn’t too short in length to wear a shirt heal with it.  The fabric was very comfortable. Highly recommend as you could dress it up or down.

Not too thick or too thin! Easy to dress up or down. You could even wear the sleeves off shoulder if desired. Snatches perfectly at the waist area with just enough flare at the bottom! I ordered a size Large and it fit perfectly
Ordered this to wear on NYE. Arrived in time and fit great EXCEPT for the length. Would have to have hemmed in order to wear. Ended up returning but this is a cute jumpsuit.
This has been perfect to wear to go out to a nice dinner, holiday parties and even work. So comfy and cute. Lightweight but not see through. Perfect fit. Received a lot of compliments!
It was poorly made and hung off of you like a sack
Bought this for my daughter. It’s so cute on her!! Fits nice and very flattering. I’m going to get another one in another color.

This romper is the most flattering and comfortable thing I’ve ever put on my body! I’m buying one in every color, you just simply can’t go wrong! Size down though! I got an XL and could have used a medium!
I really like that it’s really comfortable and fits just right.
It’s good quality but not for all types of bodies.
This works have been great, but waaay too big. I suggest sizing down

True to size and gorgeous! Very flattering on this chubby girl

This jumpsuit is awesome! I bought it for family pictures and absolutely loved it. I get so many compliments when I wear it. I think it fits nicely and is true to size. It did come a little wrinkled, but a steamer took care of that very quickly. It washed well and dried nicely and did not shrink at all. The red color is gorgeous perfect for Christmas time and is very comfortable.

I tried 2 of these on. Not only was the fabric incredibly cheap, the torso was so short that it gives you major camel toe if your body type has a longer torso. 😒 I even measured myself twice and referenced the size chart… it wasn’t good. Just not flattering at all.
Fits perfect. The length was perfect for me...a little longer so I can wear heels.

I absolutely love this jumper. It is very flattering on me and I received some amazing compliments. I am pretty busty (36ddd), 5’8” and 160lbs. The large was perfect. Hugged all the right places. You can wear it casual or dress it up!!!

It fits beautifully. Hugs the right places and forms to shape really well.
I could have sized down to a medium but a large, which is my normal size still fit!

I bought the deep green color about a week ago and absolutely love it. Got the black one in today and I’m absolutely in love. I need all the colors, a spiral staircase, and a husband that’s died mysteriously
Originally bought on navy blue. Then ended up getting this one. Both are adorable! I’m 5ft2in Good length with a bit of a wedge. I’m wearing the Size xs. It Runs a little bigger so I’d size down.

评论概述: Size up if you're debating sizes
评论详情: I ordered an xl which normally fits well on me and it did fit alright but it might have been more comfortable if i sized up

I read through the reviews very thoroughly and checked my measurements before I purchased. It's important to know I only gave this 4 stars because even with careful research, I still got it wrong.  The outfit itself is beautiful. It's comfy, it's loose and I love how it looks on my body. I just dislike that's it's too large. I'm 5'7", 210lbs, with a mom-pouch, wide hips and thick thighs. I typically wear a size L-XL tops and a size 12-14 in jeans. So when I purchased this, I was told a Large would be a great fit for me. It was not, I should have definitely sized down. I will be repurchasing in a smaller size!!
Love love LOVE this sooo much!!  Comfy and so stylish!!

I’m about 215lbs and wear size 14 so I went with the XL and it fit nicely. The sleeves and pants are loose but the breast area is tight. This helps hide my belly. It is pretty long so I may have to wear a small heel but I love it! I ordered it in green but now I want the  black one.

Nice item I’m 5’6 200lbs 38DDD I got a large fits great on chest area it has pockets big plus and gives a flattering look, feels nice on the skin not see through. It is a little long on me but no big deal.
I love this and can't wait to wear it! Length is longer than I thought it would be but I'll wear bigger heels!

I'm 5'7 and about 210lbs, 20 weeks pregnant.The large fit perfect and it's still comfy and loose and the length is perfect! Got this for the holidays and now want one in every color. One of the best jumpsuits I've owned.
I think is really cute but returned it. I think it’s be real cute on someone who doesn’t have an “apron” tummy.

Great quality and a good price. Fit is true to size. Below the waist rouching there is plenty of room for forgiveness so they could be worn for maternity as well. Seems like it would flatter most body types. The pockets are really nice and the fabric is sufficient so nothing is being seen through. Can't wait to wear them for our family picture as they look amazing dressed up but also excited to dress them down and simply lounge. 10/10

I originally got this in black and loved it so much that I got the red. I plan on getting the navy. You can wear on or off the shoulder. It washes well, is lightweight, and hides the tummy. You can dress it up or down. I did need to get them both hemmed…I’m 5’2” and 185. The XL was perfect. This is my go to outfit.
